channel.title: Hire These People
channel.description: Recent content on Hire These People

item.description: In this tough time, HireThesePeople is a website dedicated to showcasing the top talent in our industry and how to reach them. This tool does not use a database and are flat markdown files, with a focus on simplicity. To create a page for your self, you will need to create a single file with your identity. You can find more instructions on how to do that here.
